BatchDeleteAttributes.name: BatchDeleteAttributes
BatchDeleteAttributes.description:
Performs multiple DeleteAttributes operations in a single call, which reduces round
                                                trips and latencies.

BatchPutAttributes.name: BatchPutAttributes
BatchPutAttributes.description:
With the BatchPutAttributes operation, you can perform multiple PutAttribute operations
                                                in a single call. With the BatchPutAttributes operation, you can perform multiple
                                                PutAttribute operations in a single call.

CreateDomain.name: CreateDomain
CreateDomain.description: The CreateDomain operation creates a new domain.

DeleteAttributes.name: DeleteAttributes
DeleteAttributes.description: Deletes one or more attributes associated with the item.

DeleteDomain.name: DeleteDomain
DeleteDomain.description: The DeleteDomain operation deletes a domain.

DomainMetadata.name: DomainMetadata
DomainMetadata.description:
Returns information about the domain, including when the domain was created, the number
                                                of items and attributes, and the size of attribute names and values.

GetAttributes.name: GetAttributes
GetAttributes.description: Returns all of the attributes associated with the item.

PutAttributes.name: PutAttributes
PutAttributes.description: The PutAttributes operation creates or replaces attributes in an item.
